title: I need someone to explain this to me (actual question, not rage)
body:
I did my provisionals in season 3, won 3 of them and got bronze 3, in season 4 i did them, won 4 and got bronze 3 then worked my way to bronze 1 then did them in season 5 and won 5 and got bronze 4, 

im lost, not only did i do better in season 5 but also started from a higher position (bronze 1 instead of 3) so how come im ranked lower?
my friend went from unranked to Silver 2 by winning 5, i went from bronze 1 to bronze 4 by winning 5

please explain to me how the system works as i am so lost.

replies.body: ur mmr was %%%%, only real explaination
They are all bronze really makes no difference.
Everytime the ranks reset, your mmr is treated to be a little lower than what it actually is. Affects some people more than others. It's to encourage you to climb the ladder.
Who knows man but if you think you deserve higher you will climb higher.

For one thing it's what your rank was at the end of season 4 that counts, not your rank at the reset, so if they were different that may be part of the issue. Also, have you checked what your MMR is on OP.GG and what is was around before and during your provisionals? People don't often think to consider their MMR.
i was bronze 2 and end of season 4 and bronze 1 at the reset either way its still better than the bronze 3 i was before
